channel.title: Shitpoem on Ben Forgot
channel.description: Recent content in Shitpoem on Ben Forgot

item.title: Shitpoem 1
item.author: bensforgotten@gmail.com (Ben Forgot)
item.description: author’s note: I found writing terrible poetry remarkably therapeutic one evening Nothing to keep me here no reason to stay got a good backpack a map shows the way My shoes will wear out and socks’ll get thin holes in the rain gear I’ll start over again Farm and land are gone home and family too no use in crying only one thing to do Keep walking the path and checking the sky
